sentences.en: Dark and light khaki coloway, very easy for your styling!
sentences.cn: 深浅卡其配色非常好搭配!

sentences.en: He was dressed in khaki trousers.
He was wearing khaki shorts and a sports - shirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿着卡其短裤和运动衫.
我把他那条卡其布裤子的裤腿弄平展。

sentences.en: I want two meters of reversible khaki.
Khaki shorts and a green raglan T - shirt.
sentences.cn: 我穿着一条卡其布短裤,上身是一件绿色的插肩袖 T 恤.

sentences.en: New, Khaki, 4 hole, standard size, rounded edges suspender buttons.
sentences.cn: 新建, 卡其色, 四洞, 标准尺寸, 圆边吊杆按钮.

sentences.en: On each side of me was a figure in khaki.
sentences.cn: 我的两侧各有一个身穿卡其布衣服的人。

sentences.en: Orange and khaki flatter those with golden skin tones.
sentences.cn: 橘黄色和卡其色能衬托那些金黄色皮肤的人。

sentences.en: REQUIRED COLOURS: NAVY , OLIVE , KHAKI, STONE , BLACK AND GREY.
sentences.cn: 颜色: 海军蓝、卡其色 、 橄榄色 、 黑色和灰色STONE什么颜色?
她穿着时髦的卡其布服装.

sentences.en: THE khaki Bedouin tent was pitched just across from the Elys é e Palace.
sentences.cn: 贝都因人的卡其布帐篷在爱丽舍宫的正对面布置好了.

sentences.en: These shirts come in three different colours: white, pale blue and khaki.
sentences.cn: 这种衬衫有三种颜色: 白的 、 浅蓝的、土黄的.

sentences.en: Those boys looked smart in khaki.
sentences.cn: 那些小伙子们穿上卡其军装,看上去很是英俊.

sentences.en: Though Spruance's khaki shirt blackened with sweat his pace did not solw.
sentences.cn: 尽管斯普鲁恩斯的卡其衬衫被汗弄黑了,他的步子并没放慢.

words.tran_cn: 卡其色的；黄褐色的；卡其布做的

trans.tran_cn: 卡其色的；黄褐色的；卡其布做的
卡其布，土黄色，卡其布军服，卡其布裤子
trans.tran_en: a dull green-brown or yellow-brown colour
